reasons_to_visit.details: October showcases stunning fall foliage along the Vltava River and around the castle grounds.
Cool, crisp temperatures perfect for walking and outdoor exploration without summer heat.
Experience local harvest festivals and seasonal food specialties unique to autumn.
Post-peak season means fewer tourists while still maintaining good weather and services.
Autumn colors combined with medieval architecture create exceptional photography opportunities.

reasons_to_avoid.details: October weather can be unpredictable with sudden changes and occasional rain.
Decreasing daylight hours begin to limit sightseeing time compared to summer months.
Certain outdoor attractions may begin reducing hours or preparing for winter closures.
